notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All authors have been directly involved in the retrospective descriptive study and have substantially contributed to gather the information described in the manuscript and collaborated in the conception and design, the acquisition and data processing, the analysis and its interpretation. M.J. and M.J.V. designed the data collection instruments, conceptualized and designed the study, drafted the initial manuscript and the bibliography, made the critical revision of the contents and reviewed the manuscript. N.S. and A.R. collected data, carried out the initial analyses, and reviewed the manuscript. A.M. coordinated and supervised data collection, reviewed the manuscript and made substantial contributions to the conception and design. N.T. designed the data collection instruments, coordinated and supervised data collection, reviewed the manuscript and made substantial contributions to the conception and design. P.G., C.L., C.R., M.A.M. and A.D. reviewed the manuscript and made substantial contributions to conception and design. All authors approved the final manuscript as submitted and agreed to be accountable for all aspects of the work.
